summary.para: Deprecated. Parses a URL into a pointer to an item identifier list (PIDL).

param.name: uiCP
param.para: The code page (for example, CP_ACP, the system default code page).

param.name: pwszPath
param.para: A pointer to a buffer containing the URL to parse, as a Unicode string.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Display a UI element during binding.

param.name: ppidlOut
param.para: The PIDL created from the parsed URL.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Deprecated. Used in view size negotiations. This method is called by after determining the available dimensions.

param.name: hwnd
param.para: The handle of the view window.

param.name: prc
param.para: A pointer to a structure that contains the available dimensions.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Deprecated. The methods exposed by this interface are analogous to virtual protected methods in normal C++ inheritance. The inheritance hierarchy of the objects spans multiple DLLs. The hierarchy is made up of a base class and several derived classes that correspond to controls, including CLSID_WebBrowser and the user's desktop. Objects not in the hierarchy should not implement this interface, nor use most of its methods.

remarks.para: This interface also provides the methods of the and interfaces, from which it inherits.
